snippet: Syrian rebels’ handling of pro-government militiamen drew criticism amid claims of new massacres by government forces.
abstract: Battle for the Syrian city of Aleppo intensifies as United Nations observers report that Syrian jets have fired rockets into contested neighborhoods and that rebel leaders have commandeered tanks and other heavy weapons.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Hwaida Saad and Dalal Mawad from Beirut, Alan Cowell from London, an employee of The New York Times from Aleppo, Syria, and Rick Gladstone from New York.

lead_paragraph: Syrian rebels’ handling of pro-government militiamen drew criticism amid claims of new massacres by government forces.

headline.main: Syrian Fighting Intensifies in Battle for Control of Aleppo
headline.print_headline: Syrian Fighting Intensifies in Battle for Control of Aleppo

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
